pros: 100% natural and packed with premium botanical oils sourced from Down Under to nourish as it cleans
Earns praise for softening prickly beards while soothing skin
Lathers well and leaves a pleasant but mild woody scent
A single bar goes a long way
cons: Bar needs to be kept dry to keep it from dissolving

customer_reviews.title: I'm buying my next bar tonight.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on all of those high dollar shampoo/conditioners. This item you are looking at right now, on your screen. Has the wash, shampoo, whatever you want to call it is hands down the best on the market. I have had my bar for almost 4 months now and here is what I have left. It goes a long way fellas.
customer_reviews.author: JAY-KRI

customer_reviews.title: Great beard shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Great beard shampoo, my face and beard felt great after using it and you can feel it working right after you lather up with it. I've attached a photo of my beard as to show my fellow bearded men that it's great for any length as I used this from early mid beard to this glorious thing you see now. You will need to use a beard oil after using this, as with all shampoos will dry out your beard the difference with this shampoo are the natural ingredients used to make it healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i was so amazed. I just assumed my life was going to ...
customer_reviews.text: so THIS is what a real beard shampoo will do!!!!! i’ve been using “head” shampoo forever..... i just assumed the cardboard paper feeling after was normal.... in just ONE WASH.... i could feel the relaxing feeling AS i worked this into my beard. as soon as i washed it out, my frizzy beard was laying DOWN. it was all pointed down!!!! i was so amazed. I just assumed my life was going to be filled with a miserable beard..... i shampoo every other or 2 days. never used beard shampoo, but this one worked for me. i will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This soap is small but a little bit goes a long damn way. I love the smell and it cleans excellently. I've never really had a problem with beard druff but i had one instance where i notice some flaking off heavily . i wasn't sure what to do soninbought this and worked it in my beard and the next day not a flake in site and never again. I use this wrekly and the smell is awesome. Some people say the smell is terrible but those are the people i imagine who wear axe body spray and do crossfit and can't change a tire if need be. You know, manly men
customer_reviews.author: Corey L. Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this has so many good reviews, the smell is pretty gross (clove seems to be the main scent) but goes away quickly after rinsing but it doesnt work all that well. I've used 4 other shampoos and honestly would take any of them over this, my beard feels cleanish but not great and not really soft at all compared to my usual shampoo (GBS). The good thing is itll last quite a while but that's the only good thing I'd say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: EFFECTIVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the old way of getting clean. Just simple natural ingredients but VERY effective at getting a deep clean, to a squeaky rinse result and no chemicals or byproducts to irritate your skin. I use beard oil naturally afterwards because it gets it so clean it feels almost like fine broom straw if you don't hydrate it!! This is really good beard shampoo and i use it on my head hair also which i keep "medium regulation" length. Very pleased with this purchase and can tell this block of shampoo soap will last a long while!
customer_reviews.author: Dave, CenVA Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Your beard will thank you
customer_reviews.text: Your beard will thank you... and so will all of those whom you get kisses from. My 4 year old used to say the spikes on my face hurt. Now he talks to my beard, pets it and says it’s like a puppy. Now he wants a puppy. Note: puppies not included.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Brennen

customer_reviews.title: Best beard wash
customer_reviews.text: This beard wash is amazing. After doing a lot of research on different washes, this one was almost always at the top of the lists. At first I was hesitant to get it just because it doesn’t come in a liquid, but this little block of awesomeness does the job so well. My beard is softer, shinier, and the best part no more itch. I will be buying more. I’m going to be a life long customer of this all natural, all organic beard wash. And I also just ordered some leave in beard conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D.

customer_reviews.title: Just not for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: For me this was basically a bust. I don't use it on my 40+ yearold beard. Tried it twice and it made my face burn twice. Tried it on my hair. Did not burn my scalp but I felt it was a really drying soap which made it necessary for me to use more oils to get my hair back. I will use it occasionally as a hair shampoo and a body soap perhaps but this soap is not for me. I am also not fond of the scent. This soap gets great ratings but not from me.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Garziano

customer_reviews.title: Drier than the Sahara
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of online reviews before I bought this product and had really high expectations. To cut to the chase this product is a bit of a let down. My beard and face feel extremely dried out after I use this product. It does lather up well and I am sure it cleans well but I was left with dry skin and a dry brittle beard. I had to use a lot more beard oil and face lotion to make up for all the moisture this product removed from my skin. I will not be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Connor M.

customer_reviews.title: Great beard wash!
customer_reviews.text: I love this beard wash! I have been buying this wash for over a year. The only problem I have and will not gig you on, is there is no easy way to travel with it. I am on the road 5-6 days a week and have to use the box it comes in until it’s around mid size to fit in a travel soap container. The box doesn’t last long even though I dry the bar every morning before putting it away. If you made a travel box or half size bars for travel, it would be awesome! Other than my own issues, the wash has not disappointed. No itchy beard and will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.text: It smells okay, lathers well, and cleanses the day-old mustard and general mank from my beard. More importantly, I appreciate the fact that it's a cube; the most masculine shape. Other soaps, with their gentle curves and rounded edges, impinge on my identity as a man. Using them feels like a betrayal of the concept of a beard. I want a shampoo with sharp angles. Something that could cause an injury if mishandled, or when used as a weapon. This is the only tactical beard shampoo I trust in my bug-out bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Roemer

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzworthy’s Buzzworthy beard shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high-quality beard shampoo. Unlike some other products on the market, it isn’t mostly water (cheap) or chockful of alcohol, which can dry out the beard. It’s all natural oils. It lathers up well, and gives the beard a nice, clean feel. Also, it smells amazing! A powerful smell like a well-appointed den—cedar, a little spice. This is a great step 1 in a beard care regiment— it’s the wash. When followed with a nice beard conditioner, oil, and balm, Professor Fuzzworthy’s helps keep a beard mean and clean.
customer_reviews.author: krimbuskrogan

customer_reviews.title: Talk about a true deep cleansing
customer_reviews.text: The smell is great. The real trick of this is how much of a deep cleansing it does to one's beard (well, at least mine). Now when I am showering, and using this, it feels like it takes all the oils and anything else that is in your beard hair. It really feels like it dries it out, but it feels super soft only moments later and more so once you dry it. I use a towel to dry mine initially. This may be my go to beard wash from this point forward. I will say of all the other beard washes I have used, I think this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Randall

customer_reviews.title: A beard goers must have..
customer_reviews.text: As a member of BEAED GANG lol jk as a fellow beard enthusiast who knows when this awesome trend will die out so until it does which I hope and pray isn't soon I have to keep my manly wool looking thick healthy and well kempt... This soap hydrates my skin whilst nourishing the hair follicles on my beard and I saw the difference and appearance of my beard while using this stuff I would receive compliments all the time. Granted I would also used beard oils a brush and cream balms..but this is a must if you want your beard looking 💯.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shampoo. Easy to get used to using a bar. I absolutely had a great experience using this product on my beard immediately! My beard was so soft. I still used a conditioner, oil and beard butter in conjunction with this shampoo for best results. You cannot expect your beard to be perfect with just a shampoo. Although... this stuff might just do the job for some.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how I feel
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bar for almost 4 months now and it is almost gone. So as far as lasting a long time, it does. I have mixed feelings about this stuff. Every time I wash my beard, 3 times per week, it leaves my beard and skin very dry and brittle. This was a disappointment to me. I am surprised that people said this stuff made their beards soft and smooth, they must have a special kind of hair. If it wasn’t for the beard oil and conditioner that I use (different brand) I would hate having a beard. I don’t resent this stuff, but i am looking forward to trying some other products to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: Approved by my very picky boyfriend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Father’s Day, after using for one month he says he LOVES this product. I love the smell and so does he and also he states that this soap is much better than the “bottled” beard wash! I’ve noticed his beard is very shiny and skin is less flaky underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy D

customer_reviews.title: Great Beard Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Ok to start off as the other reviews stated, it is a rather small block of soap for the price paid, but a little goes a very long way. The first time I used this beard shampoo I wet my beard and rubbed the soap on both cheeks and across my chin. The next thing I knew I had suds galore, enough to wash my beard two or three times lol, so take that into consideration when buying. Leaves my beard clean and fresh without over drying or stripping it from it's natural moisture and doesn't dry my skin like most soaps or washes. No harsh chemicals, just all natural ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Prof Fuzzworthy is the Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: After trying Professor Fuzzworthy’s beard shampoo, I can definitely feel the softness in my beard versus the standard beard shampoo I’ve been using for the past year. A few scrubs of the block on each side of my beard, as well as a few on the chin and bottom of my beard, were more than enough to create the suds. I then use my fingers to scrub for around 45 seconds and wash the shampoo out of my beard after I’m done washing my body. All in all, my beard couldn’t be more happy.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful beard shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! My husband has dealt with dry skin and beardruff without any solution until this little cube of magic arrived. It smells amazing; slightly woody and citrusy, and one quick swipe on the beard creates enough for a thick, nearly instant lather. It takes the bristly, dry beard and transforms it nearly instantly to a softer, fresher beard. Jury is out on the overall moisturizering effect as we just received this, but are certainly optimistic given the early returns.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: For the most lasting longevity keep it high, out of reach of water, and on a ribbed surface. Get a good lather don't be scared
customer_reviews.text: Don't go with ones with the fancy looking bottles that will only last ya a few weeks. This shampoo with always have my business. I'm on my third bar. First time trying the apple. I could go with either one. The both make by beard soft and 1 bar usually lasts me a month. But I use mine to shave my head as well bc I'm hair follicley challenged on top. Before I was just using it on my beard I would go 3 months on one bar if you keep it high, out of reach of water, and on a ribbed surface.
customer_reviews.author: JAY-KRI

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like A Bar of Soap...But It Isn't
customer_reviews.text: So, I have to confess that I got this product out of the advice of 2 or 3 websites about beard care. I was skeptical but needed something to help soften my beard as I am in my late 40s. This shampoo works PERFECTLY! I just signed up for subscribe and save for future purchases. I do not think you will be disappointed. By the way, it lathers up on your beard thoroughly. You just have to take the block and rub it against your beard while you are in the shower (and after it is wet).
customer_reviews.author: Monte K

customer_reviews.title: Last Beard Wash You'll Ever Need.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of different beard washes/moisturizers and this has been the best one. I live in Southern California where the air is almost always dry, so my beard gets flaky sometimes. This is my second purchase as I ran out during the So*Cal wildfires a few weeks ago when the humidity was less than 5%. My chin area was super dry and irritated. First night I used it again I felt immediate relief, within the next two days the flakiness was gone and my beard feels nice and soft again. I HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend LOVES this stuff! Lasts for MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: He noticed a drastic difference after a few uses - his beard was easier to maintain and his hair was softer. The scent is great, as well. He's had it for almost 2 months and he showers every day, sometimes twice. He still has a pretty big amount left! If you're looking for a gift for that man in your life, buy him some eco friendly, great smelling shampoo that will give him luscious locks! :D
customer_reviews.author: NekroDarling

customer_reviews.title: Two issues, otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo in itself is great. It works wonders on the beard. I just had 2 issues with it. First, the shape. The cube shape makes it difficult to transport, store, and place in the shower. Second, I would've loved to get a case to store it in. The case would solve the first issue by having somewhere to place it in. Like a plastic container. That way I could take in my travels, or just place it in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: El Monks

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, nice clean, but does not control beardruff.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very mixed reaction to this product. Yes, it smells very nice - a masculine, spicy smell which I greatly enjoy, but doesn't linger all day. Yes, it makes a nice lather, and Yes, my beard feels clean and soft. However, it does not soothe my skin as promised, nor does it control beardruff. The small brick of soap is deceiving - it will last you forever as long as you keep the bar in a proper soap dish. But, as it doesn't do the most important part of the job, I will be going back to my previous product.
customer_reviews.author: Costumedzyner

customer_reviews.title: Great beard shampoo! Make sure to get conditioner to pair with it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a couple weeks now and after the first use I immediately noticed a difference. This beard shampoo does a great job of making your beard be much more dense. What I was using prior to this left my beard being really soft but it wasn't sitting well. Definitely get some conditioner. It does a great job with making your beard be more dense but if you want it to be a bit softer after the fact then you'll need some.
customer_reviews.author: A. Slohm

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, truly makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: This is the one... My husband adores this beard soap. The man is obsessed with his beard though I can't blame him. He is a diesel mechanic so the beard knows grossness and he swears it truly makes a difference in the softness and cleaness of his beard. Plus it takes so little he's it's probably going to take a lifetime to get through just one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everybody's different
customer_reviews.text: Not everyone is going to have the same results as everyone's body is different and reacts differently. I would have given this product a 1 star but I'll leave it as 3 due to what I stated before. Didn't help the itchiness and dryness that I've been suffering with my beard. Got this mainly because of the review but nope, a no go for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Echevarria

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've used any sort of dedicated product specifically for my long goatee. My girls got me the Professor Fuzzworthy Beard Shampoo and Beard Detangler as gifts for Christmas and I'm honestly impressed with the results which is a big deal because I don't hand out compliments often on most products. I'm officially onboard the Professor Fuzzworthy fan club.
customer_reviews.author: Hardcore Harley

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzworthy4LYF :)
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! The smell is excellent -- the shampoo 'cube' lasts plenty of time for effective use ( ~approx. 3 months). It conditions the beard hairs. I bought this product with the Professor Fuzzworthy Beard Care Balm Gloss and was very much impressed. This is the 3rd beard conditioner/shampoo I've tried & 3rd beard oil/balm I've tried -- Fuzzworthy4LFY
customer_reviews.author: Jon Rose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Smell, Lasts Forever
customer_reviews.text: This beard shampoo is amazing. Smells great and is super moisturizing and sudzy! It last almost a whole year for my husband who has a pretty sizable and curly beard. I've bought it for him as a Christmas/Yule present for two years now!
customer_reviews.author: pey

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer of any beard cleanser/shampoo
customer_reviews.text: For the first few months I was using Zest bar soap to wash my beard. Then I learned of beard care products from YouTube, and now my beard is soft and full. This beard shampoo is easy to use: just smear it on my cheeks, mustache, and under the chin. Done deal. It leaves my beard feeling soft and healthy after I shower, before I dry it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Olsson

customer_reviews.title: Bar soap is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I've purchased for my beard. The bar soap is the way to go. I no longer have to worry about how much beard shampoo I use. You just wipe this across your beard and you are loaded with suds. Don't feel like I'm wasting soap to get my beard clean. Not a fan of the strong smell, but the smell does not last, so it is all good.
customer_reviews.author: Smok3y

customer_reviews.title: Smells good. Doesn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: It smell really nice if I’m being honest and my girlfriend agrees. However, it leaves my hair and skin feeling stiff. Not a fan and will not buy again. All bar soaps cause my skin to become rough so I don’t know why I thought this would be different. If you don’t have the same problem as me I’m sure you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Super Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is bang for your buck! Leaves your beard clean without drying it out. This is the biggest perk, it produces a rich thick lather with just a few strokes through the beard. It’s gonna last a long time. Way longer than any liquid beard shampoo that’s for sure. Ive used just about ever beard product out there and this is my new go-to beard shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo, but very drying.
customer_reviews.text: It's working, but I had no idea how drying this was on the beard. It really dries out the beard - it strips every possible thing you had in it off of it. For me, I kind of like that. I'ts great, actually. I get to start fresh every time. I am starting to notice my beard getting a little softer though, the more I use it. I only use it about twice a week, and I use it the exactly the way a reviewer said: one quick swipe of the bar straight across the face, and that's it. If you do any more than that, then you'll really dry it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky beard!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for the past few weeks and boy has it made a difference. No more smelling like the bacon you had in the morning at the end of the day. Love the square bar, it lathers up with just a little water and smells great. My wife will actually kiss me now... This product has: 100% NATURAL shampoo bar MASCULINE woody scent Simple to use for a clean, healthy, and fluffy beard Made with Kunzea Oil for anti-itch I highly recommend and will be getting more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: PJHaley

customer_reviews.title: Customer forever!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great product for your beard! I use this to wash my beard 2x a week. It is basically a block of shampoo, that you wet and work on unto your beard. After I use the block, I put it back out the box, but if you have a soap try then use it. I'll be buying this again when my block runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Kwam

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bar!
customer_reviews.text: My husband suffered with such severe beard itch that he was contemplating cutting his beard off. I searched everywhere and came across this product. After weeks of reviewing beard shampoos etc I bought this bar hesitantly and my husband magically had no beard itch anymore within just 3 days of use!! It has been a godsend for him. He works in a very dirty environment and this soap just takes the littlest bit and lathers incredibly. Smells fantastic. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A cube of soap, really?
customer_reviews.text: Really not sure why I purchased this product. After recognizing that we live in the 21st-century having a bar or rather a cube of beard shampoo is incredibly inconvenient. There’s no way to package it up and take it with you. And of course is everyone knows when soap is left to sit in the shower stall if it’s all slimy and gross.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New gold standard of proactive beard care starts with a bar shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shampoo! I was hesitant to purchase a shampoo in bar form at first but the first time I used this product I was convinced I have been shampooing wrong this whole time. Also, can we talk about how wonderfully this bar lathers? It should be the gold standard for lathering. I use this bar for my beard and my head and almost immediately noticed how much more healthy and thick it all looked.
customer_reviews.author: Jdbouchart

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo. Did my research and compared a bunch of different beard shampoos. For the price point your not going to get any better. Ive tried many methods to get my flakes to decrease and this is the only shampoo to wipe out my dryness 95%. I notice a huge difference and can tell its a quality product. Will most likely buy for the life of my beard. Just make sure you have a soap tray for it or you'll lose some from soaking.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B.

customer_reviews.title: Dope Soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap instantly lathers and foams when met with water. My beard has been doing better with this soap and it looks like I’ll get somewhere from 45-60 uses before needing to order another The wood magnetic holder is friggin awesome. Which more soap holders did it this way.
customer_reviews.author: Anis Ali

customer_reviews.title: I like that it isn't heavy or greasy
customer_reviews.text: I like that it isn't heavy or greasy, but it doesn't do much for styling unless you already have a natural curl to your beard. This will not help you style your facial hair, but it will help give it a little support and keep it looking shiny and clean. Not much more to say. Overall I'm very pleased with the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Steve O

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great and Lathers Quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my fiance and he loves this! The smells is nice but doesn't linger, and he says just two quick swipes through his beard provides plenty of suds. I was wary of buying a "bar soap" but this seems to be a worthwhile and long lasting product- I believe the bar will last 2-3 months easily since it requires so little to lather so much. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Thunder

customer_reviews.title: Effective but expensive
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well at moisturizing your beard and the skin underneath. If I don't use it at least every other day during the winter I have flakes. The only downside is it's expensive for the size of the product. And only last a month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Great beard shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Man this stuff is Awesome! First of all a little goes a long way. It lathers up like crazy and the smell is Great. Its a small block but I've been on the same one for 5 months and it still has a 1/3 of the block left. Great value. Strongly suggest giving it a try. Just keep the block out of the direct spray of the water and it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: It's good but don't expect it to last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband because it said it's supposed to last a while. It's almost gone and I just bought it a month ago so I guess he liked it. He says "foams up and cleans well, great smell". I'm buying a different brand, we'll see how that goes
customer_reviews.author: Carla H

customer_reviews.title: Little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for little over a month now, used daily. The bar shows hardly any sign of use. I have about a 4in long beard. A tiny smear lathers up extremely well coating my entire beard. It feels very nice on the skin. It doesn't feel like its drying out my skin after. My beard also feels nice. It rinses out very well, and doesn't leave any sent on the hair either. This is my beard shampoo from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Your beard will love you for this !
customer_reviews.text: Not much for posting reviews but this product deserves it . This is now my number 1 go to beard shampoo and the fact that it comes as a bar makes it so easy for travel purposes . Just adding a little bit of water and it lathers up instantly. I have sensitive skin and this takes care of my beard and skin not leaving that dry or chaff feeling , also the smell is great ! Don’t hesitate to try this and trust me I’ve tried a a few beard shampoos and this is the real deal .
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Manly beard soap!
customer_reviews.text: Works great makes you smell like maybe you live deep in the woods and somehow make soap out of trees and honey! At first i was not thrilled when I saw how small it was but it's very long lasting and takes very little to lather up. Best beard soap I've tried thus far.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuyFromKy

customer_reviews.title: Professor Fuzzworthy's Beard Shampoo does a wonderful job of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I don't shampoo my whiskers everyday, but when I do, Professor Fuzzworthy's Beard Shampoo does a wonderful job of cleaning. Leaves beard clean and soft. Just a little goes a long way. I did take a reviewer's advice and cut the cube into 8 smaller cubes; I think doing this will make it last longer. Would highly recommend it to others and would purchase again for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Andre F. Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a week and made my beard feel like hay
customer_reviews.text: I had the bar for about a week. Thats all it lasted. It like melted in the shower. And wasnt overusing it. Smells good. Cleans good. But makes it dry. Feel like im just using a regular bar of soap.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Makes beard soft
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been looking for a good beard wash. This one is great - really softens his beard and makes it shiny and manageable. No smell left behind after you wash it out. He loves this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Worth all the hype
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really worth all the rave. Like other reviews stated, it takes just 2-3 swipes on each side of the face--if that--and you get this wonderful workable lather, and has a very pleasant 'manly' smell of wood, or an art of shaving store. My beard definitely is a little softer afterward. Like after any shampooing product, its important to put some beard butter product afterward so it does not dry your beard out. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Juneja

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have a very, very course & difficult to tame beard. I unfortunately did not find that this shampoo helped reduce the corse-ness of my bristle-pad of a beard. Ive had much better luck with other products. Scent was nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my box store "all natural" beard wash. The bar lasts alot longer then the liquid soap. You dont end up with wasted product on the floor of your shower. The scent is not too strong but enough that you will be able to smell it after getting out of the shower. Will purchase again once the current bar runs out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say this moisturizers your beard but it sure as heck doesn’t dry it which is good enough for me. Lasts a long time if it’s stored away from water. Lathers very quickly. Doesn’t have a particularly strong smell. It’s pleasant I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Salah Awadalla

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend's beard has never felt better!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend takes great pride in his beard and has several different kinds of beard oil. I wasn't sure when I ordered this if he would like it, but I figured it couldn't hurt to try. He absolutely loves it and has used it everyday since I gave it to him. I saw a few reviews that said this is difficult to use. My boyfriend said he did exactly what it says to do on the box and it worked perfectly. I personally don't care for the smell (smells somewhat tobacco like) but my boyfriend loves it. Overall I think this is perfect for any man with a beard!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It goes on easy, lathers nicely
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many many beard washes. When I 1st bought it I was skeptical because I've tried so many. This exceeded my expectations. It goes on easy, lathers nicely, and my beard does not tangle . Before I use this I had a bit of beardruff In my skin itched due to the change of season. Within a week my beard looked healthy skin felt great. I used it for shaving my head as well. It lasts about 2 and a 1/2 months for me. I have a very large beard
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Farwell

customer_reviews.title: My beard is happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the beard scene and I have to say I didn't know about beard shampoo. I'm glad I know now. It really makes a difference in texture and look. If you love your beard take care of it and this soap/shampoo will help you do that.
customer_reviews.author: G. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells great, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was strange buying a hard block of shampoo but it works great. Just like a bar of soap, all you gotta do is scrub it in the beard a little bit and you get enough lather to do the job. I only use it every other day and it's lasted me months, for that the price is really nothing. Doesn't leave the beard super dry and has a great rosemary, almost piney smell. The smell is strongest the first time you use it, either that or you just get used to it. Definitely gonna buy another and going for the apple scent one this time.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Top notch product
customer_reviews.text: Greatest shampoo I’ve tried yet. It does a good job cleaning and softening your beard. And if you have corse hair like me, you’ll be using leave in beard balm and oil for style. This product removes it all with one wash. Just got another bar; the first one lasted a good while. Highly recommended over bottled beard shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Chicks dig it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great soap but make sure you use a soap saver under bar so it doesn't melt away! I'm getting more ass than a toilet set since I started using Dr Fuzzworthy! It's AMAZING women act when you tell them that you're Fuzzworthy!
customer_reviews.author: Gunny

customer_reviews.title: No more beardruff!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and it grows on you (me). One cube bar will last you a long time. You just need to barely rub it on your wet beard and you'll get plenty of lather. I had really bad beardruff (new word) and the combo of this and a beard balm to keep a healthy amount of natural oils after the shampoo completely fixed the issue. I'll definitely be subscribing after I figure out how long it takes to run out.
customer_reviews.author: xenoffense

customer_reviews.title: absolutely LOVE this soap
customer_reviews.text: absolutely LOVE this soap!! Leaves the beard clean, its not scented and its perfect together with a good balm applied after the wash. These guys have a loyal customer. A+ product.
customer_reviews.author: s0lohans

customer_reviews.title: Your face and beard will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Discovered this product in an online review of beard grooming products and am so happy I bought it. It smells so good that you’ll want to eat it and like the fact the scent of the essential oils don’t linger and compete with fragrances. Leaves my beard feeling soft, more manageable and the skin underneath hydrated. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Smith

customer_reviews.title: Solid product...
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and strips your beard. I have a 6 inch beard and use this twice a week. A "manly" scent that I enjoy. I cut it in half and half fits nicely in a soap dish. It comes in a square so if you don't cut it, it won't fit in anything. Solid product...
customer_reviews.author: Biased Perspective

customer_reviews.title: Beard Valhalla
customer_reviews.text: Holy hanna does this stuff lather. I saw some reviews saying the soap lathered a lot. Understatement. Other review said the conditioner bar doesn't lather that much. Bogus. The tea tree oil isn't thaaat strong of a smell for what it is. The conditioner bar smells kind of cinnamon-y too, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: Best around!
customer_reviews.text: I've literally tried them all and I've found it this is the best by far. Leaves my skin feeling clean and my beard nice and soft. Plus it last a long time great deal. Don't go to any other push the but button now! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Elder03

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying solid shampoo and I really like it. I think I bought this a year ago and I still have like a quarter of the block left, and I wash my hair regularly. It smells pretty nicely--just like their beard balm, but not as strong. Used with a good conditioner, it left my hair soft and nice-looking. Will buy again, after this block is spent.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I was looking for something to clean my beard and found this. The first time i tried it i really liked it. It cleans it without drying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great beard shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have not found another shampoo that lathers as well as this does. It rinses cleanly. To me it has an earthy green apple smell. The bar has held together very well. It does dry out my skin a little bit
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive marketing practices
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon entry lists 125g, but the box says 115g. Would rate 0 stars for deceptive marketing practices if I could. Will update review after using the soap. Edit: Added 1 star because the soap does actually work pretty well. Still not happy about the lying in the Amazon listing, though.
customer_reviews.author: Iwnsbdjdk

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. Lathers up quite a bit and keeps my beard clean. No major difference in the softness of my beard. As a bonus, I lathered some up on my scalp and it eliminated my dandruff issue.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: like a dehydrated
customer_reviews.text: Was not a fan at all. It made my lips feel weird after shampooing my beard, like a dehydrated, just-ate-way-too-many-potato-chips feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Clean.  Manageable.  Zero Itchiness. Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many beard shampoo and soap options and this one is by far the best! My beard gets clean and remains fairly soft and manageable. Add a little beard oil after and my beard is as healthy as can be with zero itchiness.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Would like a little more for the money. Ganna last my beard about two weeks//////// Update!!!!! Belay my last... This soap is awesome. Lathers much better than liquid or cream shampoos I have used over the years. I will most likely keep this beard product in stock...
customer_reviews.author: Chris W Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Lather up and clean your beard
customer_reviews.text: This product did a great job cleaning my beard. I love the smell of the bar and not overpowering when washing the beard. After the shower I didn’t notice any smell, which was great as I don’t want it mixing with the beard oil I use. Also lathers up great. Even after using this product one time I see myself using it over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I love the scent of this product
customer_reviews.text: I don't give out 5 star reviews very often, but this one deserved it from my first use. I love the scent of this product, it is not too strong but definitely a "manly" smell if there is such a thing. You need just a small amount but you get a ton of suds from it making it very easy to cover your whole beard. I haven't noticed any extra "shine" to my beard since I started using it but that isn't the reason I purchased it so I won't take away any starts for that. Overall and excellent product for the price and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Beard Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that for me to give 5 stars a product or service must go above and beyond my expectations. With that said I have given 4 stars because my expectations were met. After using this product for several days it was immediately noticed that it produced the results it claimed. My beard was softer and looked much nicer than when I was not using this product. Must have for men with beards.
customer_reviews.author: Evin

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I was dealing with these dry, itchy patches under my beard before using this product. The beard wash I was using before had sulfates in it. Which I had just learned can lead to drying out your skin. So i started looking for something more natural. As long as I consistently use this stuff, and keep my beard oiled. I no longer deal with itchy, dry patches under my beard. I don't think I'll go back to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Splee009

customer_reviews.title: This block is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I always research every product I buy till my eyes turn red. I see why there are so many good reviews for this little block of treasure. It like a magic cube of oilyfoamy softness. Smells awesome. I got it for my beard and it made a difference day ONE. I use it for my whole head now. Great for softening up your balls and ass too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as claimed
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this soap for over 3 years now. Love the scent leaves the face and beard felling clean soft and ready for the day ahead. If kept dry the bar will last a very good while depending on usage.
customer_reviews.author: Bls338

customer_reviews.title: I'm not overly fond of the smell but it's not horrible or overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: This is not a very large block of soap but a little goes a long way. My husband has been using this since Christmas and still has at least 2/3s of it left. And he uses it every night in the shower. As a woman, I'm not overly fond of the smell but it's not horrible or overwhelming. It's rugged and my husband likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bees knees! The little block seems to last forever, a little bit goes a long way. It doesn’t amazing job at cleaning my beard which is approximately seven months of growth untrimmed at this point.
customer_reviews.author: James Hill

customer_reviews.title: It’s the only soap I can use on my beard.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 2 years now and will continue to use it for the rest of my life, or for as long as they make this soap. I only wash my beard 1-2 times a week so a single block of soap will last 6 months or so. Smells great, deep cleans the beard, and leaves it feeling nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Professor Fuzzy is the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: Professor Fuzzy really is amazing beard soap. I was using a well know pirate brand and my beard was dry and itchy no matter how much beard oil I used. I tried PF for the first time yesterday and BAM a soft, clean, non-itchy beard. Viva la difference.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product, I use it on my entire face, beard, and behind my ears.
customer_reviews.text: This soap is awesome, it smells great and does my beard right. I also use it to wash my face and honestly is one of the best face washes I have used, not sure if that is its intended use but it works very well for me, keeping oil off my face and from behind my ears all day. Also love that it doesn't contain any harsh chems.
customer_reviews.author: Relevance

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I've went through maybe 6 bricks of these since I got one the first time. It's incredible. My hair feels soft, is much easier to maintain, and overall health improved a lot. And all of that is after using plenty of other shampoos too, which were a lot less useful but a lot more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan S.

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I resisted for a long time buying this stuff, but after trying many, many things, I finally decided to bite the bullet. I'm glad I did. This stuff cleans without draining every single facet of oil from my face (you still need to apply beard oil/balm after use though). It really is the best beard shampoo on the market. Many folks will struggle with it being in bar form, but bar form shampoos, in my experience, generally are better for the skin, as they contain more natural ingredients. Try it; I doubt you'll get anything else after.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second time, getting this.
customer_reviews.text: First time got the yellow and black, this time green and black. Both work awesome, have a rich lather, and smell great. Only downfall is the shape. Doesnt fit in a standard soap tin, so if you leave it on your shower caddy like i do, then water splashing will dissolve it faster than if you could keep it dry, when not using.
customer_reviews.author: john belak

customer_reviews.title: Beast for the beard!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It was a little smaller than I expected as I didn't read the dimensions, but it shipped fast and was as advertised. It has a fine, masculine scent, and I could feel the difference after the first use. I use a little jojoba oil afterwards and my beard feels soft, strong and healthy with no more split ends. I can actually run my fingers through it without hitting a snag. My beard hasn't felt so good since I started growing it a year and a half ago. Treat your beard right. Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Master Weber

customer_reviews.title: A good shampoo and conditioner with Argan oil does equally the same job
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been growing a beard at a pretty considerable length for the past 10 years. I’ve gone through phases where I thought I’ve needed something extra for my beard when it turns out a really good shampoo and conditioner is all you need for your beard and a little argan oil. I bought this product and have nothing negative to say about it, it actually gives me the same shine and softness as shampoo and conditioner. But I do find that when I use my Pureology conditioner on my beard my beard is softer than it Is when I use the fuzzworthys soap.
customer_reviews.author: joshua bishop

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: rub bar directly into beard a few times. suds quick and nicely. both the wash bar and the detangler/conditioner bar work well. not sure if i like Fuzzworthy bars or Beardbrand liquids better. i highly recommend both
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Guess I'm in the minority
customer_reviews.text: Lathers up nicely, but made my beard dry and brittle. Will keep using for a week or so and see if things change at all, but will likely return to dove soap or baby shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Ctown

customer_reviews.title: The best beard wash
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The scent is not overpowering. The bar also seems to last forever. Going on 2 months now with daily use and the bar has only been reduced by 1/2. Will not drop out your skin
customer_reviews.author: John Sairfo

customer_reviews.title: I don't just need the soap I love this soap
customer_reviews.text: Having a beard is a lot of responsibility in this soap helps me out with that responsibility! Owning a beard is a dangerous thing but somebody has to do it!
customer_reviews.author: ALEXANDER ZUCKERMAN
